DESCRIPTION.BODY: All Dream locations can be accessed here, provided you own them of course! Non-owners can get an idea of what they're missing out on by watching promo videos and perusing posters.
所有的「夢幻」系列個人空間都可由此進入，不過當然要您先購買這些個人空間才行。如果您沒有這些個人空間，不妨看看宣傳片及海報，了解一下您到底錯過了什麼！
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
